title: Cape, mid 19th century
medium:
Medium: silk, glass beads
Technique: glass beads sewn onto grosgrain; lined with twill
description: Small cape for an ecclesiatic figure, the "Bambino". Blue silk grosgrain with grapevine design embroidered in white and cream coloured glass beads and silver sequins along the edge. Lined with blue silk twill.

tombstone.epitaph:
Cape, mid 19th century.Medium: silk, glass beads
Technique: glass beads sewn onto grosgrain; lined with twill. 1899-2-4.
